name: Viking Rush
description:
Today's a special day!

it's one you're wholly unprepared for! Race against the clock to collect everything you need for tonight's birthday party! 

Collect Mushrooms 🍄Meats 🍖and importantly BEEEER!!! 🍻 to feed your Guests

Collect Trees 🌲 Stone ⛰ Gold🧈?! for the things needed in your hut

Drop the items you've collected in your hut, who do you think you are, Steve?  You can only carry a limited amount of items at a time.  

But hurry up you only get 1000 sec to collect 1000 items or your guests won't show up 😟💔

Key Bindings: 

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Drop Items inside the hut
  • Tab - To-do List
  • ESC - Pause
This is your Hut, Drop your items here by pressing E and check your TO-DO list after! 👉

Known Bugs:

Mouse Pointer did not work on Web Build so you won't be able to aim with the mouse

Mob Spawner has an incorrect value in it and may lag sometimes. F5 would do the trick just incase

We will update and fix the game when we can upload another build
